alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 9:06PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS AND AREAS OF BLOWING SNOW... West to southwest winds are gusting to around 50 mph in the western foothills this evening, creating areas of blowing and drifting snow and difficult crosswinds. As the night goes on wind gusts of 30 to around 50 mph will spread eastward through Sweet Grass, Stillwater and eventually into Wheatland and Golden Valley counties. Expect gusty winds and areas of blowing snow with visibilities as low as 2 miles. Drifting snow will make roads slick and icy in spots. Difficult crosswinds can be expected along I-90 near Livingston and on US-191 north of Big Timber. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Columbus, Big Timber, Absarokee, Springdale, Reed Point, Fishtail, Dean, Mc Leod, Pine Creek, Melville, Greycliff, Nye, Roscoe, Luther and Rapelje. Although this event is expected to be short lived, if conditions worsen, a Winter Weather Advisory may become necessary. Please monitor local media outlets and the National Weather Service for further statements. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in these situations. Be prepared for difficult crosswinds, poor visibility, and slick roads when traveling tonight. Slow down and allow extra time to get to your destination safely.
